item.title: I need to make the Guthix portal randomize between the Zammy and Sara portals
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

[quote=“LeScape Pk, post:15, topic:95260”]…im not telling you HOW, neccesity is the mother of invention, create a random in misc, then in your case put

misc.random(#);

… ffs[/quote]
I already knew that but I don’t know how to apply that to the code to make it do one of two sets of things. The only way that works for me is to get like random numbers and stuff.

item.title: I need to make the Guthix portal randomize between the Zammy and Sara portals
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

slay blad3:

At some time you need to get on your legs and start scripting. I see you here all the time. Your scripts are made by the members of this forum based on your idea. You have the idea, you have the information you need, try to put it together. Its honestly not that hard and it’s all the fun.

Lol, all of the stuff I posted here have been form one script I had, I couldn’t get it to work. I figured out the problem though. It’s just I’ve never heard of anybody being able to randomize 2 sets of actions, or even 2 actions of that matter, if it was randomizing a number, I’d do it, but I really have no idea what to do here, and nobody here is helpin me either, just tell me what I"m supposed to do in English.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to make the Guthix portal randomize between the Zammy and Sara portals
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

LeScape Pk:

make a random… -.- sheesh, morons

…make a random?
wth are you talking about?
Oh and you guys might think this is funny but I found a whole void in my client devoted to randomness that seemed to point to nothing look at it:
public void randomize(int o,int oo,int ooo,int oooo) {
outStream.createFrame(53);
outStream.writeWord(o);
outStream.writeWord(oo);
outStream.writeByte(ooo);
outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(oooo);
flushOutStream();
}

Lol, I though that was kind of random…another pun :P. OH yeah…o oo ooo oooo…it’s a ghost…:P. If you don’t believe this is real search for it in your client, it’s probably there.

Read full topic

If you have Pimp search

you should find a code for a random guthans effect. Try to implement that into your teles.

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:2, topic:95260”]make a void[br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2007, 05:50:41 PM[/size][hr]teleport zammy if > 10
} else {
teleport sara

btw-that will not even get close to working[/quote]
Huh…
I want that portal as the code shown to do one of the two sets of actions I said randomly. You would be the most helpful if you would just give me the full code for the guthix portal. It shouldn’t be hard if you know what to do since I gave you the portal code and what I want for the two random actions…

item.title: I need to make the Guthix portal randomize between the Zammy and Sara portals
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

Here’s my Guthix portal code:

if (objectID == 4408 && (objectX == 2436) && (objectY == 3089)) //Guthix portal { //ToDo: Make this randomize Zamorak and Saradomin, to pick one randomly. //teleportToX = 1951; //teleportToY = 4825; //heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("This feature is currently not available"); }

Can somebody edit the code for me so it randomly does either this:

   teleportToX = 2427; //Teleport to arena
   teleportToY = 3077; //Teleport to arena
   heightLevel = 1; //Teleport to arena
   playerIsSaradomin = true; //Make player Saradomin
 addItem(4041, 1); //Add cloak
 wear(4041, getItemSlot(4041)); //Equip cloak
 sendMessage("You joined the Saradomin Team!");
 sendMessage("You cannot log out while in castlewars!,You must leave and comeback if you do");

or randomly does this:

   teleportToX = 2372; //Teleport to arena
   teleportToY = 3130; //Teleport to arena
   heightLevel = 1; //Teleport to arena
   playerIsZamorak = true; //Make player Zamorak
 addItem(4042, 1); //Add cloak
 wear(4042, getItemSlot(4042)); //Equip cloak
 sendMessage("You joined the Zamorak Team!");
 sendMessage("You cannot log out while in castlewars!,You must leave and comeback if you do");

If you could just edit the code for me that would be great, I have no idea how to make something do one of 2 things randomly…oh and sorry for being blunt, uh blunt is just more to the point. (lol I made a pun :P.)

Read full topic
item.source: I need to make the Guthix portal randomize between the Zammy and Sara portals
